original_title: Home Lands records highest sales done in a month in history
original_body_lines: Achieves an impressive Rs. 7.4 b from 104 units in June 2025

Home Lands, has once again reaffirmed its market leadership by achieving a historic milestone in the country’s property sector. The company recorded the highest ever sales turnover in a month by any real estate developer in Sri Lanka, generating an impressive Rs. 7.4 billion in sales from 104 units in June 2025 alone. This landmark achievement was significantly driven by the successful launch of Pentara Residencies, the latest addition to the company’s growing portfolio of premium developments.

This achievement is not only a testament to the strength of the Home Lands brand but also to the continued trust and confidence placed in it by clients, both locally and internationally. The June 2025 performance marks a new benchmark in monthly developer turnover, setting a record in Sri Lanka’s real estate history.

In addition, Home Lands has reported Rs. 25 billion in sales during the first half of 2025, amounting to over 80% of its total annual sales of Rs. 31 billion in 2024. This trajectory strongly indicates that the company is on course to surpass all previous performance records by the end of the year.

With over 20 years of excellence in the industry, Home Lands continues to drive innovation in Sri Lanka’s real estate landscape while maintaining its core values of Trust, Innovation, and Excellence. The company has built a reputation not only for delivering quality developments, but also for upholding transparency and customer-centric service, earning the trust of thousands of families and investors both locally and internationally.

This latest achievement underscores Home Lands’ commitment to pushing industry standards and delivering exceptional value in a competitive market environment. As the company continues its journey of growth, its focus remains firmly on transforming the real estate experience in Sri Lanka.
